subject: Re: want to generate report (html) by running my simple test suit with drools + ant + junit
msgSnippet: Nikhil, I use the JUnitReport task. http://ant.apache.org/manual/OptionalTasks/junitreport.html ... attachments to ... addressee(s) and may ... you are not ...
messageBody:
Nikhil,

I use the JUnitReport task.
http://ant.apache.org/manual/OptionalTasks/junitreport.html

--- Patrick

--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "David Saff" <david@...> wrote:
>
> Nikhil,
>
> For generating HTML reports with ant, Googling
>
> ant junit html
>
> worked pretty well for me. I'm not sure how drools would make this
> more complicated.
>
> David Saff
>
> On Mon, Nov 3, 2008 at 12:54 AM, Nikhil Deval <ndeval@...> wrote:
> > hey all
> >
> > - want to generate report (html) by running my simple test suit with
> > drools + ant + junit
> > - what are steps need to follow. please share any simple example
> > available with you.
> >
> > Thanks in advance
> > Nikhil
